projects.title: Live dB
projects.about: Front-end capstone project using AngularJS. Allows the user to import their Spotify playlists and search for concerts using the SongKick API

projects.title: Pinterest Jalapeno Hotties
projects.about: Group project using AngularJS. Knockoff pinterest site

projects.title: Weather App
projects.about: JQuery based project allows the user to search by zip and view the local forecast

projects.title: Theme Park Misc
projects.about: Group project using JQuery. Allows the user to lookup attraction info for a fictious and mysterious theme park

projects.title: Chatty Daddy
projects.about: Marginally offensive chat app that utilizes browserify for a modular based design

projects.title: Dynamic Cards
projects.about: Uses pure javascript to traverse the DOM
